* Iron Raptor was glad to have a little fuzz ball safe and away in her back 
compartment, her helm over her head and her sword drawn.
She had barely noticed Shadow Cat and Snow Tech dropping close to her, her 
scanners going over the battlefield.

There were Maximals and Alliance bots all over the field, and to chose only 
one target was diffacult. Though, the gustalts could easily be seen, but 
much to big a match for just her.
But, just as her eyes went over the field again she finally spotted a bot 
she could get.
To test her power out on.
With her cape flowing in the wind of war, Iron Raptor raised her sword 
towards the sky, feeling the blade glow for a second before bringing it 
down. An energy slash sent straight for Perndabot's side.
But before the slash would hit, she  brought her sword by her side and ran 
towards him, wondering just how this body could handle close combat.*
